Notes.Text:
This update for liblouis fixes the following issues:
  
- CVE-2023-26767: Fixed buffer overflow vulnerability in lou_logFile function (bsc#1209429).
- CVE-2023-26769: Fixed buffer Overflow vulnerability in resolveSubtable function (bsc#1209432).

Vulnerabilities.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Liblouis v.3.24.0 allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via the lou_logFile function at logginc.c endpoint.

Vulnerabilities.Description: Buffer Overflow vulnerability found in Liblouis Lou_Trace v.3.24.0 allows a remote attacker to cause a denial of service via the resolveSubtable function at compileTranslationTabel.c.
